short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your own code (HTML, CSS, JS) to your favourite websites. A simple fast way to improve :) your favourite websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your own code (HTML, CSS, JS) to your favourite websites. You have 3 different ways to work, from the popup in the top icon, from a browser tab or from the development tools (Ctrl + Shift + I or F12)
